localVariable.name: EmailSender__body
localVariable.initialValue: text::This is the message body for %l%l%ltoday%r%r%r

localVariable.name: Jython__code
localVariable.initialValue:
text::import time import java.lang.String
today = time.strftime("%pm/%pd/%py",time.localtime(time.time())) data.setPlain("today",today) data.setPlain("foo","blah blah")
